#include "iostream"
#include "stdio.h"
#include "vector"
#include "string"
#include "algorithm"

#define LLD long long int

using namespace std;
vector<LLD> v;
int n,k;
LLD cache[10001];

LLD dp(int i)
{
	if (i >= n)
		return 0;

	if (cache[i])
		return cache[i];
	else
	{
		cache[i] = max(dp(i + 1), v[i] + dp(i + k + 1));
		return cache[i];
	}
}

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t-- > 0)
	{
		cin >> n>>k;
		std::fill(cache, cache + n, 0);
		v.resize(n);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			cin >> v[i];

		cout << dp(0) << endl;


	}
	
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
